title: 465.58 MEMBERS OF THE LEAGUE OF CITIES.
text:
Any city of this state, whether organized under the general laws or a special or home rule charter, or any town having the powers of a statutory city under section 368.01, may appropriate through its council or town board, out of its general fund, money to pay the annual dues in the League of Minnesota Cities and the actual and necessary expenses of such delegates as such council or town board may designate to attend meetings of the league.
MS 1953 [Repealed, 1957 c 935 s 27]
